name: Lucas Harford
description: Lucas Harford is the current CEO ofMilitech, anAmericanmegacorporation that focuses on weapons manufacturing. Harford is considered to have inherited the best traits of past Militech CEOs. Harford is particularly considered to be the spiritual succesor to former Militech CEO,Donald Lundee. He is a faithful ally of NUSA's PresidentRosalind Myers. Militech reports that he is very pragmatic and level-headed in terms of policymaking. Harford is reportedly a very generous and patriotic man, an example being that he once footed the bill for the medical treatments of a veteran of theUnification...
